work-item.field:
Workflows for Documents define and control process for entire Documents.

Document workflow applies only to the Document, and is separate and apart from any workflow defined for the Work Items it contains.
It enables you to trace the history of a Document's progress from inception to completion of whatever life cycle you need for Documents.


A "workflow" consists of a set of :
  • named statuses (draft, in review,etc.)
  • named actions  (sendToReview)
  • named transitions (change of  the Document's status by user's action )
